pre_caption: The video is a cityscape scenery shot, capturing a broad view of an urban park area dominated by a tall, intricately designed monument with tiered architecture and dark stonework, set against a dramatic sky with scattered clouds. The scene includes manicured green lawns, a paved walkway, and several national flags, with modern buildings visible in the background, all contributing to a sense of scale and atmosphere. There is no main subject because the focus is on the overall environment and the monument’s relationship to the city, emphasizing the grandeur and ambiance of the location rather than highlighting any individual object or person.
pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
original_caption: The video is a cityscape scenery shot, capturing a broad view of an urban park area dominated by a tall, intricately designed monument with tiered architecture and dark stonework, set against a dramatic sky with scattered clouds. The scene includes manicured green lawns, a paved walkway, and several national flags, with modern buildings visible in the background, all contributing to a sense of scale and atmosphere. There is no main subject because the focus is on the overall environment and the monument’s relationship to the city, emphasizing the grandeur and ambiance of the location rather than highlighting any individual object or person.
initial_feedback: In the picture, a row of flags stands at the edge of a lawn, next to which is a sidewalk paved with red bricks. Between the sidewalk and the square is a wide asphalt road, on which various vehicles such as cars, motorcycles and bicycles are traveling.
gpt_feedback: The image features a row of national flags positioned at the edge of a manicured lawn, adjacent to a red brick-paved sidewalk. Separating the sidewalk from the square is a broad asphalt road, bustling with diverse vehicles including cars, motorcycles, and bicycles.
final_feedback: The image features a row of national flags positioned at the edge of a manicured lawn, adjacent to a red brick-paved sidewalk. Separating the sidewalk from the square is a broad asphalt road, bustling with diverse vehicles including cars, motorcycles, and bicycles.
final_caption: The video captures a cityscape scene featuring a broad view of an urban park area dominated by a tall, intricately designed monument with tiered architecture and dark stonework, set against a dramatic sky with scattered clouds. A row of national flags lines the edge of a manicured lawn, adjacent to a red brick-paved sidewalk. Separating the sidewalk from the square is a broad asphalt road, bustling with diverse vehicles including cars, motorcycles, and bicycles. Modern buildings are visible in the background, all contributing to a sense of scale and atmosphere, emphasizing the grandeur and ambiance of the location rather than highlighting any individual object or person.
